mapper.sql: a.dbid AS "dbid", a.id AS "id", a.dealcode AS "dealcode", a.reliefamount AS "reliefamount", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.createby AS "createby", a.derateReason AS "derateReason", a.remark AS "remarks"
mapper.select: SELECT a.dbid AS "dbid", a.id AS "id", a.dealcode AS "dealcode", a.reliefamount AS "reliefamount", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.createby AS "createBy.name", a.derateReason AS "derateReason", a.remark AS "remarks" FROM t_mis_reliefamount_history a WHERE a.dealcode = #{dealcode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mis_reliefamount_history( id, dealcode, reliefamount, createdate, createby, derateReason, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dealcode}, #{reliefamount}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.name}, #{derateReason}, #{remarks} )
